name: shengbte
description:
ShengBTE is a software package for solving the Boltzmann Transport
Equation for phonons.

dependencies.name: mpi
dependencies.description:
Mvapich2 is a High-Performance MPI Library for clusters with diverse
networks (InfiniBand, Omni-Path, Ethernet/iWARP, and RoCE) and computing
platforms (x86 (Intel and AMD), ARM and OpenPOWER)

dependencies.name: spglib
dependencies.description: C library for finding and handling crystal symmetries.
